meanings.definition: A tight-fitting one-piece garment covering the torso and legs, typically worn by dancers and gymnasts.
meanings.sent1: During ballet practice, Sarah wore a pink leotard.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast's leotard sparkled under the stage lights.
meanings.sent3: The leotard decided to do a somersault on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her leotard was a second skin, showcasing every movement.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red leotard stood out among the sea of costumes.
